answers.answer: Cipro is a strong antibiotic.  It should be taken under prescription of a doctor for an infection that is not responsive to other antibiotics.It is important to control infections when they occur in people with diabetes or prediabetes, as infection can worsen blood sugar control and overall health.

question: May I ask if its okay for pre diabetics or diabetics to take strong meds, like Cipro ?thank you
title: meds
